main: Her defense skill gives her {status:DefensiveStance} which gives her {status:DefenseUp} and {status:Aggro}, allows her to clash attacks regardless of speed, and triggers {status:VibrationExplosion} whenever she wins a clash.
Her S3 triggers an additional {status:VibrationExplosion} and deals more damage with {status:DefensiveStance}.
other: Skills give her additional {status:DefenseUp} and get stronger based on how much she has.
S3 spends {status:Vibration} Count to increase its {status:Vibration} application and increase its damage.
{status:Vibration} Count passively gives her more {status:DefenseUp} and increases her {status:Vibration} application on her S2.

1081001.desc: At Combat Start, gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Vibration] Count on self (max 5)
1081001.name: Shock-nullifying Greatsword

1081011.desc:
At Combat Start, gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Vibration] Count on self (max 5)
- If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], double the amount of [DefenseUp] gained from the above effect.
1081011.name: Shock-nullifying Greatsword

1081021.desc: At Combat Start, compare each Identity's current HP to their HP at the start of the previous turn. Then, apply 2 [DefenseUp] to the Identity with the greatest disparity of HP values between turns.
1081021.name: Emergency Protection

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume all [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the value of the Count consumed as [Vibration] on target. (max 10)
- Deal +(excess [Vibration] x 1.5)% damage (max 30%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce the target's [Vibration] Count by 1
